contentValues.tagData: \u00A0 Apply the 'PROJECT SIMPLIFIED 2015' language option to the DESCRIPTION and RECOMMENDATION report sections below. Associate your 2 Site Photographs from your Photo-log. Once associated to the report section, caption your 1st photo 'Description' amd 2nd photo 'Recommendation' Add the appropriate Cost Reccommendations, based on the content of the language you applied. \u00A0 ***THIS IS DIFFERENT FOR EACH SECTION*** Toggle the 'Description' to 'Good'. \u00A0 Toggle the Recommendation to 'Replace'
